recipesJson.name: Mounds Candy Bar
recipesJson.author: Mindcrime
recipesJson.description: Vape Train Dark Chocolate is pretty spot on so i decided to make a Mounds Candy Bar.  For the coconut i went with TPA Coconut Candy and a little Coconut Extra and added in a little Bavarian Cream to add some mouthfeel. This recipe turned out really well after a weeks steep
